name: Curious Ghosts
description:
BECOME A GHOST HUNTER!

The town is overrun with ghosts and it’s your job to hit the streets and test your skills as a ghost hunter. Solve handcrafted puzzles and learn about the town of Spirit Elm. Cute and curious ghosts need capturing in each of the unique levels in this exciting puzzle adventure

Curious Ghosts is an accessible puzzle game with a charming art style. Solve over thirty handcrafted puzzles designed to be fun to beat and challenging to complete. Be guided by your boss – and grandma – through the story of Spirit Elm and it’s ghost inhabitants

SOLVE HANDCRAFTED PUZZLES!.

Lead ghosts through levels to be captured in Nanna Anna’s patented Spirit Catcher Model ‘46. But, be careful not to step into them or you will scare them away. Avoid scare squares that terrify ghosts, manoeuvre one-way traps and avoid swarms of bees.

Explore all the areas of Spirit Elm including farms, houses, the arcade, the bowling alley, the train station and many more locations. Each level brings an interesting new puzzle that may look deceptively simple.

COLLECT HIDDEN RELICS!

Collect and complete your haunted relic museum by discovering sixteen unique items hidden throughout select levels, which Nanna Anna will be happy to tell you about.

With an accessible design and one-handed gameplay, Curious Ghosts is a puzzle game for the entire family.
